name: Breakout Birdie Panic
description:
Breakout Birdie Panic will challenge your skill and reflexes to the max! Take aim at numerous block types and avoid the bevy of buzzsaws, spikes, cannons, and flying and diving bug and bird bosses! Hit bombs to destroy blocks and hazard and activate switches to disable the mines as you attempt to bash all the blocks in each level! Catch power-ups to temporarily improve your birdie's abilities by making it invincible for a short time or turning it into a mighty powerball! Play forever in Endless Mode, add some temporal pressure in Timed Mode, or tackle increasingly challenging levels in Campaign Mode.


GAMEPLAY
Tap the screen to make the Birdie flap its wings. Avoid enemies and hazards while bashing blocks, detonating bombs, and hitting switches! Catch falling power-ups to gain extra hearts and special abilities such as temporary invincibility! Once you're bashed all the blocks, dive into the portal to complete the level!

For more information, please refer to the How to Play screens within the app.


FEATURES
* Another hilarious block-bashing birdie bonanza!
* Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
* Includes Endless, Timed, and Campaign modes!
* Dozens of different block types!
* Cool power-ups to enhance your abilities!
* 60 unique levels to unlock and master!
* Colorful cartoon characters and environments!
* Bright and bubbly background tunes!
* Intuitive touch-screen controls!
* Suitable for players of all ages!
